caption.p: Summary of random-effects meta-analysis for the primary and secondary mitochondrial gene lists

tr.th: Heterogeneity of variance from random effects (%)

table-wrap-foot.p: Here, we show the random-effects meta-analysis of heritability estimates for all SNPs in the genome (All SNPs), estimate calculated with for the SNPs within the primary mitochondria list genes (Primary), and the SNPs within the secondary mitochondria list genes (Secondary)
